summary: Added __eq__ and __hash__ methods to Todo class to enable object comparison and deduplication
implementation_notes: __eq__ compares by id AND text for equality
__hash__ is based only on id to enable set deduplication
Returns NotImplemented for non-Todo comparisons (Python best practice)
risks: Hash collision possible for different ids (extremely unlikely with Python's hash)
Todo objects with same id but different text will have same hash but not be equal (works correctly in sets)

verification.ruff_command: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_minimal_framework.py

fixes_applied.issue: E711 Comparison to None should be `cond is not None`
fixes_applied.fix: Changed `assert todo != None` to `assert todo is not None`
